Bot: The bot user that will represent Math
Bot_Description: Create a bot user and type its username here.
Customize_Icon_Description: Change the icon that is used for messages from this integration.
Customize_Name_Description: Choose the username that this integration will post as.
Slash_Command_Params_Example: [2+2, simplify(0.25), round(3.593), sqrt(3^2 + 4^2), 2 inch to cm, etc.]
